In November Texas plans to adopt new science textbooks which will be used in classrooms there for the next decade. This new documentary, by independent producer Trey Kay, examines Texas’ perennial battle over science standards and, in particular, how high school biology books explain evolution and the origins of the universe.


Read more about The Long Game.
